    • Professional Experience

    Distrubute Information Collection and Analysis Platform

    Shenzhen Finance Institute,CUHK(SZ)
    2017-Present

    Distribute Information Collection and Analysis Platform collects social network information and analyzes the public sentiment exceed industrial quality. I am responsible for designing and implementing whole data pipeline including web crawling, data bus design, data warehouse design and cluster provisioning.

  • Frameworks: Scrapy Cluster, Spark Streaming, Kafka, Redis, Zookeeper, Logstash, Elasticsearch, mysql
  • The crawler can automatically login the website, retain the login session, parse the webpage content and crawl incrementally.
  • The system is designed in micro-service fashion and provisioned on the Kubernetes cluster. The system takes the advantages from Kubernetes and micro-service structure which the crawling node can be scaled up in seconds.
  • Data processing use the state-of-art big data processing frameworks, including Kafka, Elasticsearch, and Spark Streaming. Kafka cluster worked as a data bus store parsed webpage content. Spark streaming consumes the data from the Kafka pipeline and predicts the public sentiment from the social media post. Elasticsearch is mainly responsible for the full-text retrieval. The system processes 16 GB streaming data daily and control delay within 10 mintues.

    • Rancher Flat network project

    Rancher Labs Inc.,Phoenix,USA
    2017

    (SDN) Rancher Flat network project based on Container Network Interface for Container Cloud, which gain 99% hardware bandwidth. The Flat network plugin implements the IP allocation for the containers and the container network connectivity. The containers , Virtual Machines and baremetal machines can access to each other and they are in the same subnet and network hierachy.

  • Developing tools and language:Golang, Container Network Interface, Linux network namespace
    • Rancher Flat Network documentation Flat Network Demo Setup

    Research on Human Posture Recognition Algorithm and Application based on Microsoft KINECT

    Beijing Normal University,Zhuhai
    2014

    Four posture recognition algorithms based on Microsoft Kinect sensor．Four algorithms were developed to define different postures including running, walking, turn left and right, hand up and virtual car wheel. Algorithms are based on Euclidean metric, angles and relative position. Two applications had been made in animation and security monitoring aspect relatively. The algorithms have been tested in applications which have high recognize rate and reliability. The algorithms are capable of consuming-level using.

  • Developing tools and language:C#,Unity 3D
    • Demo Unpublished Dissertation

    National entrepreneur start-up campaign, China
    2014

    This project had been proposed when I join the National entrepreneur start-up campaign. The idea is providing a safe and reliable navigation application. The shining point is that projecting laser parallel lines indicate the direction for the bicycle riders. A demo had been made for proof of the concept.
